title: Butter
description: Butter Swap is the premier decentralized liquidity venue on Mantle, the Ethereum layer-2 redefining scalability with its modular architecture and decentralized data availability component.
strategy:
✅ Make swaps to earn points & fishing attempts
✅ Use the fishing attempts to earn MNT
✅ Points will be converted into BUTTER tokens

title: Derivio
description: Derivio is an ecosystem of derivative protocol suites that can satisfy both speculative and hedging needs for a plethora of digital assets, with an experience that is smooth for all traders, developers and institutions.
strategy:
✅ Trade perps
✅ Trade binary options (predict)
✅ Trade Spot
✅ Mint and stake DLPM

title: Wormhole
description: Wormhole is a generic cross-chain messaging protocol platform.
strategy:
✅ Bridge across different chains on the dapps using Wormhole including Portal Bridge, Carrier, Allbridge Core, Mayan
✅ Bridge NFTs across supported chains

title: Nocturne
description: Nocturne is a protocol enabling private accounts on Ethereum. Nocturne allows users to deposit or receive funds to private, stealth addresses within the Nocturne contracts. Then, in the future, a user can prove ownership of assets in zero knowledge for use in arbitrary transactions or confidential transfers.
strategy:
✅ Deposit ETH
✅ Make swaps 
✅ Stake ETH
⚠️ Attention: Interacting with Nocturne could result in high costs due to the high L1 gas fees.

title: Hinkal Protocol
network: Ethereum, Optimism, BNBChain, Arbitrum, Polygon, Avalanche, zkSync, Base
description: Hinkal is a protocol enabling private trading & yield farming strategies on EVM chains. Hinkal allows liquid funds and retail users to create a private account(s) and transact on their favorite dApps entirely untraceable (the origin and destination of transaction, value, and private mempools) and almost free, charging only 3 basis points per transaction.
strategy:
✅ Deposit on different chains
✅ Make swaps
✅ Provide liquidity
✅ Stake assets
✅ Participate in Galxe campaigns

title: Parcl
description: Parcl v3 is a perpetuals exchange designed for real estate synthetics. It supports cross margined perps trading on various real estate markets. LPs add liquidity to a single LP pool per exchange where they take on trader PnL as well as earn trading fees.
strategy:
✅ Trade (1 point per $)
✅ Provide liquidity (3 points per $)
✅ Bind referral code for 5% boost - code: alphadrops
✅ Invite your friends

title: Marginfi
description: marginfi is a decentralized lending protocol on Solana that prioritizes risk management to provide a safe and reliable solution for users looking to access leverage and maximize capital efficiency.
strategy:
✅ Lend
✅ Borrow
✅ Refer

title: zkSync
description: zkSync is a ZK rollup solving Ethereum scalability with zero security compromises.
strategy: Bridge ETH from L1 to zkSync. Use some DApps supporting zkSync’s L2 like ZigZag and Gitcoin.

title: Renzo
description: Renzo is a Liquid Restaking Token (LRT) and Strategy Manager for EigenLayer. It is the interface to the EigenLayer ecosystem securing Actively Validated Services (AVSs) and offering a higher yield than ETH staking.
strategy: ✅ Stake ETH to obtain ezETH and earn Eigenlayer and Renzo Points

title: KiloEx
description: KiloEx, backed by Binance, provides traders with lightning-fast trades, real-time tracking of market activity, and a intuitive trading experience, while offering liquidity providers risk-neutral positions and LP-friendly solutions.

1. Trade perps
2. Stake assets
